articles.title: Workers trapped in building collapse in southern Cambodia

articles.content:
Five injured workers were pulled from the rubble and more debris was being removed to try to locate those still missing, he said.
The website of the National Police said some of those believed trapped had been taking a work break inside the building.

articles.title: 'Houses were exploding': In Australia's fire horror, heartbreak and relief
articles.description: After surviving a rampant wildfire this week, residents of Lake Conjola braced for the blaze to return with a vengeance.
articles.content:
LAKE CONJOLA, Australia After no news for three days, Anthony Brennan feared his older brother had perished in a wildfire that turned this bucolic coastal village into a scene of random destruction.

In all, 2.227 million people were registered as unemployed. That was 47,000 more than the previous month and 18,000 more than a year earlier.
